author: rcmorano
title: Gamify LacedWhales Twitter bot
description: Driving ADAption through Twitter beyond talking price is not usually done and it can be a great viral, amplifier.
solution: GameChanger wallet allows interacting with Cardano via HTTP links, we propose to gamify this bot using it to try to go viral on Twitter.
experience: DevOps advocate with over 15 years of experience. Ex-Emurgo DevOps Lead. Gimbalabs Co-Founder. Dandelion Founder+Operator. LacedWhales dev.
